Flow.description: [26-Jun-2024] Edit condition for getting FA users from metadata (Element: getMetaUsersFATeam).

formulas.name: NotifyTitle
formulas.expression: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Customer__r.Name} & " is request for change credit condition."

Flow.label: CTRScreenSubmitChangeCredit

fields.name: ConfirmToSubmitBodyText_Customer_TOPLABIX
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to submit this request for change credit condition?

fields.name: ConfirmToSubmitBodyText_Customer_TX
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to submit this request for change credit condition?

fields.name: ConfirmToSubmitBodyText_Supplier_TOPLABIX
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to submit this request for change credit condition?

fields.name: ConfirmationScreenDisplay_Customer_TOPLABIX
fields.fieldText: The request has been submitted to credit team

fields.name: ConfirmationScreenDisplay_Customer_TX
fields.fieldText: The request has been submitted to credit team

fields.name: ConfirmationScreenDisplay_Supplier_TOPLABIX
fields.fieldText: The request has been submitted to credit team

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.FirstName} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.LastName},

We have received your documents and they are currently reviewed.


    Company Name:             {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Customer__r.Name}

    Interested to be: Customer:   {!getRequestFormItemRecord.InterestedRegistrationToCustomer__c}

    Responsible Trader Name:     {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.FirstName} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.LastName}

    Request Number:            {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Name}


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody_TX
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!getRequestFormItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.FirstName__c} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.LastName__c},

Thank you for your interest in becoming our customer . We have received your documents and they are currently under review. Please find below the details of your request:

Company Name: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.fmlAccountTypeName__c} for {!getRequestFormItemRecord.ProductName__c}

Responsible {!fmlAccountTypeActor} Name: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.FirstName} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.LastName}

Request Number: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Name}


We will contact you as soon as possible with the outcome of the review. If you have any questions, please contact our Sales Representative at {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.FirstName} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.LastName}

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: EmailBodySupplier
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!getRequestFormItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.FirstName__c} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.LastName__c}{!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.LastName},

We have received your documents and they are currently reviewed.


    Company Name:             {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Customer__r.Name}

    Interested to be: Supplier:    {!getRequestFormItemRecord.InterestedRegistrationToSupplier__c}

    Responsible Trader Name:     {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.FirstName} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.LastName}

    Request Number:            {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Name}


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyTOP
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!getRequestFormItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.FirstName__c} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.LastName__c},

We already registered your company information and currently under review.

Company Name: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.ProductName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.FirstName} {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Owner:User.LastName}

Request Number: {!getRequestFormItemRecord.Name}


Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.
